column5: Does anyone know where I can get a decent deal on XD-100??  TIA.

coming from snowmobiling, i know amsoil makes an equivalent...might be worth looking into.  its a little cheaper than skidoo specific oil, but amsoil products are high quality, i would argue perhaps even higher quality than OEM
Yes I love Amsoil too but for the amount I have invested I want to stick with OEM.
Get it out of the bulk drum ,about as cheap as I've found it.
